mapper.select: SELECT * FROM accidentdata WHERE accidencnumber IN (SELECT shigunumber FROM accidencecollectiondata WHERE admin_id IN (SELECT admin_id FROM admin a,team t WHERE a.team_id = t.id AND t.team_name = #{team}) AND environmentnumber IN (SELECT emnumber FROM emdata WHERE Jcktype LIKE #{jckType})) AND xianQu = #{region}
